title: Counter
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406012700/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406012700/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Counter**

The enclosed parts of a letter, such as [lowercase](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406012700/http:/typophile.com/wiki/lowercase) **p** , **q**.
author: paul d hunt
